intents.sub_intent: how to save on car insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce car insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their premiums are too high or are comparing options.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to offer personalized insurance savings calculators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded calculators.

intents.sub_intent: what not to say to an insurance adjuster
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid mistakes that could negatively impact their claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this after filing a claim or preparing for a conversation with an adjuster.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide expert advice and claim management tools via ING's app.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Step-by-step guide with examples of phrases to avoid.

intents.sub_intent: how to get the most out of an insurance claim
intents.user_motivation: Users want to maximize their claim payouts and understand their policy coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing an incident and filing a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's customer trust and expertise in guiding claims effectively.

intents.sub_intent: how to avoid paying high auto insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want strategies to lower their premiums without compromising coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when renewing policies or comparing providers.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Promote ING's European expertise in offering competitive insurance rates.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive comparison tool with tips for reducing premiums.

sub_intents: how to save on car insurance
how to avoid paying high auto insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can leverage its digital banking leadership to offer personalized insurance savings tools and calculators.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a unified hub with savings calculators, comparison tools, and actionable tips.

sub_intents: what not to say to an insurance adjuster
how to get the most out of an insurance claim
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's customer trust and European expertise can position it as a reliable guide for claim optimization.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop a claims management guide with step-by-step instructions and policy-specific advice.

highest_probability_streams: how to save on car insurance
how to avoid paying high auto insurance
how to get the most out of an insurance claim
quick_wins: Create listicles and guides for saving on car insurance.
Develop interactive tools for comparing insurance rates.
strategic_priorities: Invest in a comprehensive insurance savings hub.
Build trust-focused content around claims management.
